h1: Which type of fit note do you have?

radioLabels.paper: I have a paper fit note
radioLabels.digital: I have a digital fit note

hintTexts.paper: A paper fit note will have been handed to you or sent to you in the post
hintTexts.digital: A digital fit note will have been sent to you by email or text, or you might have been given a weblink to access it online
